name: Super Rubber Band Boy
description:
SUPER RUBBER BAND BOY

You play as a rubber band and ping yourself from peg to peg in order to complete levels.

Xbox controller required!

Controls:

  • Left analog stick to aim
  • A to shoot
  • Y to restart level
  • Back to go back to main menu

This project was made as part of a game jam, over the course of 48 hours. The theme was "Flexible".
